item.title: Rift of the NecroDancer DLC ‘hololive Music Pack’ now available
item.content:encoded:
Brace Yourself Games, in cooperation with COVER Corporation, has released Rift of the NecroDancer downloadable content “hololive Music Pack.”

The “hololive Music Pack” Consists of the following content:

  • “REFLECT” by Gawr Gura (free to download)
  • “BIBBIDIBA” by Hoshimachi Suisei
  • “Ahoy!! Warera Houshou Kaizoku Dan☆” by Houshou Marine
  • “Play Dice!” by Hakos Baelz
  • “Carbonated Love” by IRyS

Each song can be purchased individually for $1.99.

Rift of the NecroDancer is available now for Switch and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

DLC “hololive Music Pack” Announce Trailer
